channel.title: Comments on: Got a triple collateral
channel.description: Welcome to the home of Battlefield V! Your place for discussion, help, news, reviews, questions, screenshots, videos, gifs, and anything else BFV related! Battlefield V is developed by DICE and produced by EA. This subreddit is ran by dedicated fans of the series and has no affiliation with EA or DICE.

item.title: By: LeatherSurvey6
item.dc:creator: LeatherSurvey6
item.description: This point defending on breakthrough absolutely slaps, especially when calling in artillery as they’re about to cap
item.content:encoded: This point defending on breakthrough absolutely slaps, especially when calling in artillery as they’re about to cap

item.title: By: R-TheKingSlayerX

item.description: Nice shot, but why are you playing with the Kill log off?
item.content:encoded: Nice shot, but why are you playing with the Kill log off?

item.title: By: IncredibleBert
item.dc:creator: IncredibleBert
item.description: Last week fucked around and got a triple-double
item.content:encoded: Last week fucked around and got a triple-double

item.title: By: Piwde
item.dc:creator: Piwde
item.description: Lattey sight on anything other than an smg seems so weird to me, the Tromboncino is probably still my most used gun, and I swear I can only aim with the 3x on that thing, iron/latteyclose-range sights are just impossible with how used to 3x I am.
item.content:encoded: Lattey sight on anything other than an smg seems so weird to me, the Tromboncino is probably still my most used gun, and I swear I can only aim with the 3x on that thing, iron/latteyclose-range sights are just impossible with how used to 3x I am.

item.title: By: rhuffman4645
item.dc:creator: rhuffman4645
item.description: Jungle rifle really is satisfying to use.I loved it so much I did the Gold skin challenges on it and OMFG they were so hard Jesus I sank so much time into that.
item.content:encoded: Jungle rifle really is satisfying to use.I loved it so much I did the Gold skin challenges on it and OMFG they were so hard Jesus I sank so much time into that.
